sub_fields.message: The below fields allow you to modify the look and layout of this module.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: If you include a background image, it will take precedence. This is not required, and will default to white (#FFFFFF). Dark blue (#012d62) and light blue (#f0f5fa).

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will center vertically and horizontally as well as cover the entire container.

sub_fields.label: Center content?
sub_fields.name: center_content
sub_fields.instructions: By default, short and tall hero options center all content. Select this if you want to additionally center the content for the split option.

sub_fields.label: Dark Mode
sub_fields.name: dark_mode
sub_fields.instructions: Makes basic copy styles white. For use with a dark background color or image.

sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: Not needed. Useful if you would like to add an anchor link to this section.

sub_fields.message: The below fields allow you to modify the look and layout of this module.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: If you include a background image, it will take precedence. This is not required, and will default to white (#FFFFFF). Dark blue (#012d62) and light blue (#f0f5fa).

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will center vertically and horizontally as well as cover the entire container.

sub_fields.label: Dark Mode
sub_fields.name: dark_mode
sub_fields.instructions: Makes basic copy styles white. For use with a dark background color or image.

sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: Not needed. Useful if you would like to add an anchor link to this section.

sub_fields.label: Left Content
sub_fields.name: main_content_left
sub_fields.instructions: By default this is the 33% width content, unless you select the flip option.

sub_fields.label: Right Content
sub_fields.name: main_content_right
sub_fields.instructions: By default this is the 66% width content, unless you select the flip option.

sub_fields.message: The below fields allow you to modify the look and layout of this module.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: If you include a background image, it will take precedence. This is not required, and will default to white (#FFFFFF). Dark blue (#012d62) and light blue (#f0f5fa).

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will center vertically and horizontally as well as cover the entire container.

sub_fields.label: Flip sides?
sub_fields.name: flip_sides
sub_fields.instructions: This will make the 66% section on the left. The 33% section will still be on top on mobile.

sub_fields.label: Dark Mode
sub_fields.name: dark_mode
sub_fields.instructions: Makes basic copy styles white. For use with a dark background color or image.

sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: Not needed. Useful if you would like to add an anchor link to this section.

sub_fields.label: Number of Columns
sub_fields.name: number_of_columns
sub_fields.instructions: This defines number of columns in a row.

sub_fields.label: Intro Image
sub_fields.name: intro_image
sub_fields.instructions: This is optional. Displays at a maximum of 70% the column width.

sub_fields.label: Column Button Text
sub_fields.name: column_button_text
sub_fields.instructions: Optional button at the end of a column.
